name: Magic Recall
description:
Description:

As a novice wizard, you've wandered into the forest to hone your skills. At the moment, you can only cast a fireball that travels a short distance and returns. At the receiving end of jokes made by your fellow wizard brethren, you are determined to brave the waves of enemies to prove you're the best wizard alive.

Controls:

Attack: Mouse Click

Move: W-A-S-D

Team:

Aaron Packer, Casey Gatlin, Jessica Adamson, Joseph Newman, Richard Spratt, Wenhao Gu
